sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react'; import { Container, Grid, Card, CardContent, Typography, Box, Button, Avatar, Chip, TextField, InputAdornment, IconButton, Badge, Dialog, DialogTitle, DialogContent, DialogActions, Tab, Tabs, List, ListItem, ListItemAvatar, ListItemText, Paper, Divider, LinearProgress } from '@mui/material'; import { Groups, Search, Send, VideoCall, MoreVert, Circle, Psychology, School, SentimentSatisfied, Forum, GroupAdd, Star, Favorite, AccessTime, LocationOn, EmojiPeople } from '@mui/icons-material'; const PeerSupport = ({ user }) => { const [activeTab, setActiveTab] = useState(0); const [selectedPeer, setSelectedPeer] = useState(null); const [message, setMessage] = useState(''); const [searchQuery, setSearchQuery] = useState(''); const [showMatchDialog, setShowMatchDialog] = useState(false); // Mock peer data const [peers] = useState([ { id: 1, name: 'Anonymous Student A', avatar: 'https://api.dicebear.com/7.x/avataaars/svg?seed=student1', major: 'Computer Science', year: 'Junior', status: 'online', compatibility: 92, sharedChallenges: ['Academic Stress', 'Social Anxiety'], lastActive: '2 min ago', isMatched: true, supportGiven: 15, supportReceived: 12 }, { id: 2, name: 'Anonymous Student B', avatar: 'https://api.dicebear.com/7.x/avataaars/svg?seed=student2', major: 'Psychology', year: 'Senior', status: 'online', compatibility: 87, sharedChallenges: ['Time Management', 'Perfectionism'], lastActive: '5 min ago', isMatched: true, supportGiven: 22, supportReceived: 18 }, { id: 3, name: 'Anonymous Student C', avatar: 'https://api.dicebear.com/7.x/avataaars/svg?seed=student3', major: 'Engineering', year: 'Sophomore', status: 'away', compatibility: 78, sharedChallenges: ['Academic Pressure', 'Sleep Issues'], lastActive: '1 hour ago', isMatched: false, supportGiven: 8, supportReceived: 10 } ]); const [supportGroups] = useState([ { id: 1, name: 'Study Stress Support', description: 'A safe space for students dealing with academic pressure', members: 24, activeNow: 8, category: 'Academic', lastActivity: '5 min ago', isJoined: true }, { id: 2, name: 'Social Anxiety Circle', description: 'Connect with others who understand social challenges', members: 18, activeNow: 3, category: 'Social', lastActivity: '15 min ago', isJoined: true }, { id: 3, name: 'Mindfulness & Wellness', description: 'Daily practices for mental health and well-being', members: 42, activeNow: 12, category: 'Wellness', lastActivity: '2 min ago', isJoined: false }, { id: 4, name: 'Graduate School Prep', description: 'Support for students preparing for graduate studies', members: 15, activeNow: 4, category: 'Academic', lastActivity: '30 min ago', isJoined: false } ]); const [messages] = useState([ { id: 1, sender: 'Anonymous Student A', message: "Hey! I saw you're also dealing with academic stress. How do you manage during finals week?", timestamp: '10:30 AM', isOwn: false }, { id: 2, sender: 'You', message: "Hi! I try to break everything into smaller tasks and take regular breaks. What about you?", timestamp: '10:32 AM', isOwn: true }, { id: 3, sender: 'Anonymous Student A', message: "That's a great approach! I've been using the Pomodoro technique lately. It really helps with focus.", timestamp: '10:35 AM', isOwn: false } ]); const handleTabChange = (event, newValue) => { setActiveTab(newValue); }; const handleSendMessage = () => { if (message.trim()) { // In a real app, this would send the message to the backend console.log('Sending message:', message); setMessage(''); } }; const handleMatchRequest = (peerId) => { setShowMatchDialog(true); }; const getStatusColor = (status) => { const colors = { online: '#4caf50', away: '#ff9800', offline: '#9e9e9e' }; return colors[status] || '#9e9e9e'; }; const filteredPeers = peers.filter(peer => peer.name.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) || peer.major.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) || peer.sharedChallenges.some(challenge => challenge.toLowerCase().includes(searchQuery.toLowerCase()) ) ); const TabPanel = ({ children, value, index }) => (
{value === index && {children}}
); return ( Peer Support Network Connect with fellow students who understand your journey. Anonymous, safe, and supportive. {/* Stats Cards */} 12 Active Connections 47 Support Points Given 4.8 Support Rating 28 Hours This Month {/* Main Content */} } /> } /> } /> {/* Active Connections */} Your Active Connections {peers.filter(p => p.isMatched).map((peer) => ( setSelectedPeer(peer)} > } > {peer.name} {peer.major} {peer.year} {peer.sharedChallenges.map((challenge, index) => ( ))} {peer.compatibility}% compatibility ))} {/* Support Groups */} Support Groups {supportGroups.map((group) => ( {group.name} {group.description} {group.members} members {group.activeNow} online Last activity: {group.lastActivity} ))} {/* Find New Peers */} setSearchQuery(e.target.value)} InputProps={{ startAdornment: ( ) }} sx={{ mb: 3 }} /> Recommended Matches {filteredPeers.map((peer) => ( {peer.name} {peer.major} {peer.year} {peer.sharedChallenges.map((challenge, index) => ( ))} Gave {peer.supportGiven} support points Received {peer.supportReceived} {peer.compatibility}% match ))} {/* Chat Sidebar */} {selectedPeer ? ( {selectedPeer.name} {selectedPeer.status === 'online' ? 'Active now' : selectedPeer.lastActive} {messages.map((msg) => ( {msg.message} {msg.timestamp} ))} setMessage(e.target.value)} onKeyPress={(e) => e.key === 'Enter' && handleSendMessage()} InputProps={{ endAdornment: ( ) }} /> ) : ( Select a peer to start chatting Connect with fellow students for mutual support )} {/* Match Request Dialog */} setShowMatchDialog(false)} maxWidth="sm" fullWidth PaperProps={{ sx: { background: 'rgba(26,29,41,0.95)', backdropFilter: 'blur(20px)', border: '1px solid rgba(255,255,255,0.1)' } }} > Send Connection Request Would you like to send a connection request to this peer? You'll be matched based on: Similar academic challenges Compatible support styles Mutual anonymity and respect All conversations remain anonymous and are moderated by AI for safety. ); }; export default PeerSupport;
